Image.Alt: 2 scouts in class A uniforms standing behind a table. The scout on the left is holding on to something, while the scout on the right is looking at it.
Image.Caption: Scouts John Dowling (middle left) and Seth Hendrick (middle right) teach first aid at a troop meeting.

Image.Alt: A scout in a class A uniform is lying on the floor on his side, pretending to be hurt.
Image.Caption: Seth Hendrick pretending to be a victim in a first aid demonstration at a troop meeting.
